scripts.deploy:dev: aws s3 sync dist/ s3://$(aws ssm get-parameter --name /dev/outcomeops-analytics/dashboard/s3_bucket --query Parameter.Value --output text) --delete
scripts.deploy:prd: aws s3 sync dist/ s3://$(aws ssm get-parameter --name /prd/outcomeops-analytics/dashboard/s3_bucket --query Parameter.Value --output text) --delete
scripts.invalidate:dev: aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id $(aws ssm get-parameter --name /dev/outcomeops-analytics/cloudfront/dashboard_distribution_id --query Parameter.Value --output text) --paths '/*'
scripts.invalidate:prd: aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id $(aws ssm get-parameter --name /prd/outcomeops-analytics/cloudfront/dashboard_distribution_id --query Parameter.Value --output text) --paths '/*'
scripts.publish:dev: npm run build:dev && npm run deploy:dev && npm run invalidate:dev
scripts.publish:prd: npm run build:prd && npm run deploy:prd && npm run invalidate:prd
